com.apple.mrj.dnd
Class DragAdapter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
        |
        +--com.apple.mrj.dnd.DragAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
DragListener, EventListener, MouseListener
Deprecated. As of MacOSX 10.2, replaced by Java2 DnD.

public class DragAdapter
extends MouseAdapter
implements DragListener

An adapter class, a null implementation of the DragListener interface.
